column1: Art Institute of Chicago////So we went there on Saturday night to view the exhibit "Impressionism
column2: Fashion and Modernity." The event included a theme
column3: "Dressed to the Nines" which gave us a chance to dress up! This was a pricey event
column4: but there is a discount if you have a membership
column5: which I suggest that anyone in the surrounding Chicago area purchase. This museum displays several iconic art pieces such as "American Gothic."
